description: Updates a Voice Connector's logging configuration.

parameters.name: LoggingConfiguration
parameters.description: The logging configuration being updated. EnableSIPLogs (boolean) --- Boolean that enables sending SIP message logs to Amazon CloudWatch. EnableMediaMetricLogs (boolean) --- Enables or disables media metrics logging.

nested_params.name: EnableSIPLogs
nested_params.description: Boolean that enables sending SIP message logs to Amazon CloudWatch.

nested_params.name: EnableMediaMetricLogs
nested_params.description: Enables or disables media metrics logging.

nested_items.name: EnableSIPLogs
nested_items.description: Boolean that enables sending SIP message logs to Amazon CloudWatch.

nested_items.name: EnableMediaMetricLogs
nested_items.description: Enables or disables media metrics logging.
